title: Man broke girlfriend’s ankle after tarot cards revealed his cheating
text:
Tarot card cheater broke his ex’s ankle (Picture: Getty; Police handout)

A love rat assaulted his girlfriend after tarot cards revealed he’d been cheating on her.

Jenna Clemence had been seeing Ben Johnston, 41, for a year when she claims he started acting shiftily after receiving a late-night message.

She then consulted her tarot cards, asking them if her partner had another woman on the go – and realised she had been wronged when the first two cards came up as queens.

Johnston’s sister then opened up and revealed her sibling had another long-term girlfriend he was seeing at the same time.

Ms Clemence, from Blackpool, then went to confront her boyfriend at his house, but he tackled her like a rugby player and broke her ankle.

Police put out an appeal to track down Johnston (Picture: Police handout)

Miss Clemence told the Daily Star: ‘He charged at me like a rugby tackle.

‘When I suspected Ben of cheating, I knew my tarot cards would reveal the truth. The cards never lied.

‘I laid out the cards in front of me and asked the question, “Does Ben have another woman?”

‘I flipped over the first card. It was a queen. Then I turned over the second. It was another queen.’

In January, Blackpool Police issued an appeal to track down Johnston following the ‘nasty assault’ that took place on March 4 2018.

Tarot? Is it me your looking for? (Picture: AFP)

Speaking at the time PC Stephen Rotherham said: ‘We would like to trace Mr Johnston in connection with a nasty assault.

‘We would urge anybody who has seen him, or who knows where he may be, to get in touch.’

Johnston was eventually arrested and was sentenced to 16 months in prison, suspended for six months, in August.
